title: An Island Made for Two
description: A Clean Forced Proximity, Second Chance RomanceAbby Morgan just sold her house and waved goodbye to her kids as they head to college. She's finally going after her dream: To live on the North Coast of Maine and to write Mystery Books. Before she signs off on the purchase of Cherry Tree Island, Abby agrees to spend two weeks alone on the self-sustaining island to ensure she's up to the task.This is the first book in the Cherry Tree Island series. The books must be read in order.Also published as a novel titled Cherry Tree Island.
author: Daisy Landish
